What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. tested on artifacts, play artifact
2. cast Destructive Revelry, destroy target artifact
3. controller gains 2 life What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Destructive Revelry: target artifact's or enchantment's controller gains 2 life instead of losing 2 life
